summary: Replaces the main menu theme with a relaxing song by Vindsvept.
descriptionHtml:
This file replaces the main menu theme with the song [i]Norrsken[/i] by Vindsvept & Merrigan.

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a3yPtf2Esdg][youtube]a3yPtf2Esdg[/youtube][/url]

Link to the artist's page: 
[url=http://vindsvept.com/]http://vindsvept.com/

[/url]Please do subscribe to his youtube channel if you like his work.

I would also recommend the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25084/]Civil War Themed Main Menu[/url], it really suits the song imo.
You could try installing [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8023/?]No Bethesda Logo In Menu[/url] as well for a cleaner main menu.
author: saenokda
